titles.title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of candles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/24/2005--Introduced. Directs the Customs Service to: (1) liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of candles without assessment of antidumping duties and interest; and (2) refund any amounts owed.
